page.title: 09Grundisburgh Life and Style
page.content: Homelife and Lifestyle vary with the expectations of the individual; almost full employment financing. There are no obvious signs of poverty; Malnutrition, Neglect of Person and Property, Crimes of Violence, Theft etc: and obvious signs of affluence. Most households have access to motor transport; with mobility used for utility and pleasure purposes. A full village centred social life is available for those who wish though some longer resident express concern at the participation of newcomers.* Facilities and opportunities for executive involvement are however available to all. Grundisburgh remains an active and caring community. * See Population for statistics on Length of Residence.
